domain.title: Cookie domain
domain.description: Optional. Restricts the retrieved cookies to those whose domains match or are subdomains of this one.

name.title: Cookie name
name.description: Optional. Filters the cookies by name.

url.title: Cookie URL
url.description: Optional. Restricts the retrieved cookies to those that would match the given URL.

storeId.title: Cookie Store Id
storeId.description: Optional. The cookie store to retrieve cookies from. If omitted, the current execution context's cookie store will be used.

session.title: Cookie Session filter
session.description: Optional. Filters out session vs. persistent cookies.

path.title: Cookie path
path.description: Optional. Restricts the retrieved cookies to those whose path exactly matches this string.

secure.title: Cookie Secure filter
secure.description: Optional. Filters the cookies by their Secure property.

debounceTimeout.title: Amount of time to wait for consecutive events (such as Cookie changes)
